text: 12.33 Jon 18.32 Pen Jisas anɨb agak, Yɨp dɨl dad aplanenɨgel agak ak, yad anɨgɨl kumnɨgebin agak.12.32-33 Jisas ne anɨb agak, Bɨ okok yɨp mab bak alaŋ dad aplanɨgabal agak. Agek nɨŋɨd, bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap anɨb agɨlak, Anɨgenɨgab, God Jisas nop dad man ne alaŋ amnɨgab agɨlak. Pilipay 2.9-11 nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
